sentences: Graduate Software Developer (C# / Cyber Security)
Lutterworth - Hybrid Working
£25,000 - £30,000 + Hybrid Working + Extensive Training + Company Benefits
Are you a Graduate Developer looking to create some of the most hi-tech, specialist Cyber Security Software products for organisations like the Federal Aviation Administration and Boeing?

Do you want a role where you will be provided with a tailormade training programme and technical development courses, where you can kick start your career in one of the most exciting environments for a Graduate Developer in the country?

Within this role, you will be receiving industry leading training, where you will be challenging yourself every day and learning about the leading cybersecurity threats that are affecting some of the top Government organisations in the world
In this role, you will be working in a variety of different Cyber Security projects, primarily coding in C#/
NET
You will be working on and Developing Cybersecurity applications, taking pride in your work as you are trained up in a highly collaborative and supportive team
This role would suit a Graduate Software Developer with a focus on C#/
NET, working for a company that is looking to kick start their career and develop your skillset rapidly in an organisation that is pushing the limits of Cybersecurity Technology
The Role:
Developing Cybersecurity Applications primarily in C#/
NET
Working in a team of close-nit Software Developers in an Agile environment
Hybrid working
The Person:
Experience C#/
NET Software Development
Degree in Computer Science or related subject
